message.raw:
* Trigger a preparse after remote set_globals()
* Add `interactive` kwarg to Runmanager.get_active_groups so that it can raise
  an exception for remote calls rather than show an error dialog.
* Turn app.preparse_globals_required into a Queue instead of an Event so that
  the number of times it is triggerd can be counted, in order that callers
  can block until all preparsing is complete using .join()
* Add method runmanager.wait_until_preparse_complete() that does this.
* Call app.wait_until_preparse_complete.wait() in handle_n_shots so that the
  result is not subject to a race condition w.r.t. previous remote calls.
* Call app.wait_until_preparse_complete() in handle_engage(). I'm not sure
  it's necessary, but it is strange to be (virtually) clicking engage when the
  button is greyed out, and there may be code (present or future ) that assumes
  you can't do this.
* Do not run blocking remote code such as globals evaluation in the main thread.
  have remote methods only hop into the main thread when required.
* Modify remote handle_error_in_globals to take into account all globals, not
  just those open in tabs.
* remove inmain() call from the remote server's handler - apply inmain calls
  only where they are required within individual handler methods, so that the
  GUI is not blocked by globals parsing.
* remove some unused imports
